item.title: Need some help with coding

item.description:
@Andrezz wrote:

Hi, i need some help with coding my 562 server, 1 of my problems is that i don’t know how to make admins/owners don’t lose stuff in death.

And how to switch textes after this:

}
if(serverMess == 0 && serverMess1 == 0){
serverMess1 = 1;
getActionSender().sendMessage("<col=0066ff>[SERVER]:<col=ff0033> rly rly need help .");
serverMess = 60;
